description: Using chain indexing may cause performance issues.
Pandas' DataFrame or read_csv methods should explicitlyset 'dtype' to avoid unexpected behavior.
radients must be cleared using `zero_grad()` before calling `backward()`.
additional_info: `zero_grad()` not called before `backward()` in loop. Code:         loss.backward()  # Punto di rilevamento: Nessun `zero_grad()` prima
